name: EcoHome Battery Storage Rebate
description: $125 per kWh up to $3,250 for battery storage with solar PV; Environmental Justice Community or income-qualified residents receive $400 per kWh up to $10,400
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy provides substantial rebates for home battery storage systems paired with solar PV, with significantly enhanced rebates for income-qualified residents and Environmental Justice Communities.
whatTheyOffer:
- $125 per kWh rebate for battery storage
- Up to $3,250 maximum rebate
- $400 per kWh for EJ/income-qualified residents
- Up to $10,400 maximum for qualifying residents
- Must be paired with solar PV
- Backup power during outages
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must have or install solar PV system
3. Reserve funds online before installation
4. Purchase qualifying battery storage system
5. Have professionally installed within 120 days
6. Submit final documentation and receipts
